User SIPUsername As Line
off Enable support for broken registrar with "on". That means that incoming INVITE's from your provider do not contain the Contact URI which was previously registered by your phone as its Contact. Thus the phone can not safely identify the target line of the incoming call. If you compare the URI in the first line of the incoming INVITE and the URI in the Contact of the REGISTER, which the phone sends to the registrar of your provider they will presumably differ. If that happens, the registrar is called to be broken.
